class:
Paladin
Increases your Strength by 2%. Increases your Strength by 4%. Increases your Strength by 6%. Increases your Strength by 8%. Increases your Strength by 10%.
Increases your total Intellect by 2%. Increases your total Intellect by 4%. Increases your total Intellect by 6%. Increases your total Intellect by 8%. Increases your total Intellect by 10%.
Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell a 5% bonus to their health and all damage they deal for 2 min. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by 10 min. Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell a 10% bonus to their health and all damage they deal for 2 min. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by 20 min.
Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness and Judgement of Righteousness by 5%. Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness and Judgement of Righteousness by 10%. Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness and Judgement of Righteousness by 15%.
Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 20% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the cooldown of your Divine Favor spell by 10%. Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 40% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the cooldown of your Divine Favor spell by 20%. Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 60% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the cooldown of your Divine Favor spell by 30%. Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 80% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the cooldown of your Divine Favor spell by 40%. Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 100% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the cooldown of your Divine Favor spell by 50%.
Reduces all damage you take by 10% while polymorphed or feared. Reduces all damage you take by 20% while polymorphed or feared.
Consecrates the land beneath Paladin, doing 64 Holy damage to enemies or 128 healing to party members in the area over 8 seconds.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 2%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 3%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 4%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 5%.
Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light, Flash of Light, Consecration healing effect and Holy Shock heal spell by 4%. Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light, Flash of Light, Consecration healing effect and Holy Shock heal spell by 8%. Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light, Flash of Light, Consecration healing effect and Holy Shock heal spell by 12%.
Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 5%. In addition, your Concentration aura reduces the damage of the next attack against you by 25% when your spell casts get interrupted. Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 10%. In addition, your Concentration aura reduces the damage of the next 2 attacks against you by 25% when your spell casts get interrupted. Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 15%. In addition, your Concentration aura reduces the damage of the next 3 attacks against you by 25% when your spell casts get interrupted.
Increases the bonus healing of your Blessing of Light spell by 10%, and increases your healing done with Holy spells by 5% while Seal of Light is active. Increases the bonus healing of your Blessing of Light spell by 20%, and increases your critical strike chance with Holy spells by 6% while Seal of Light is active.
When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.
Increases the effect of your Blessing of Wisdom by 10%, and increases . Increases the duration of your Judgement of Light and Judgement of Wisdom by 20 sec.
Increases the critical hit chance of your Holy Light and Holy Shock spells by 2%. Increases the critical hit chance of your Holy Light and Holy Shock spells by 4%. Increases the critical hit chance of your Holy Light and Holy Shock spells by 6%.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, you gain Mana equal to 50% of the base cost of the spell. After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, you gain Mana equal to 100% of the base cost of the spell.
Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing 204 to 220 Holy damage to an enemy, or 204 to 220 healing to an ally.
Reduces the cooldown of your Hand of Protection by 60 sec and increases the duration of your Hand of Freedom by 3 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Hand of Protection by 120 sec and increases the duration of your Hand of Freedom by 6 sec.
Increases your total stats by 1%. Increases your total stats by 2%. Increases your total stats by 3%. Increases your total stats by 4%. Increases your total stats by 5%.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2% and grants Mana equal to 33% of the amount blocked when you block an attack. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4% and grants Mana equal to 66% of the amount blocked when you block an attack. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 6% and grants Mana equal to 100% of the amount blocked when you block an attack.
Increases your Holy damage by 2% while you have a shield equipped. Increases your Holy damage by 4% while you have a shield equipped. Increases your Holy damage by 6% while you have a shield equipped. Increases your Holy damage by 8% while you have a shield equipped. Increases your Holy damage by 10% while you have a shield equipped.
Increases your Parry chance by 1%. Increases your Parry chance by 2%. Increases your Parry chance by 3%. Increases your Parry chance by 4%. Increases your Parry chance by 5%.
Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by 5 sec. Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by 10 sec. Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by 15 sec.
Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 10% for 5 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.
Increases chance to block by 50% for 10 sec, and deals 30 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active. Damage caused by Holy Shield causes 20% additional threat. Each block expends a charge. 4 charges.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2% and the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 10%. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4% and the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 20%. Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 6% and the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 30%.
Increases your total health by your level multiplied by 3. Increases your total health by your level multiplied by 6. Increases your total health by your level multiplied by 9. Increases your total health by your level multiplied by 12. Increases your total health by your level multiplied by 15.
Increases your Defense skill by 5 and reduces the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 8%. Increases your Defense skill by 10 and reduces the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 16%. Increases your Defense skill by 15 and reduces the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 24%. Increases your Defense skill by 20 and reduces the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 32%. Increases your Defense skill by 25 and reduces the chance your helpful spells will be dispelled by 40%.
Gives your Judgement spell a 50% chance to interrupt spellcasting on the judged enemy, if it has Judgement of Justice. Gives your Judgement spell a 100% chance to interrupt spellcasting on the judged enemy, if it has Judgement of Justice.
Raises a protective ward. The next Fear, Stun or Knock Back effect against you will fail, using up the ward. Lasts 10 sec.
While . Your Righteous Fury spell . Your Righteous Fury spell .
Reduces all damage taken by 5% while afflicted with Forbearance. Reduces all damage taken by 10% while afflicted with Forbearance.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 2% and Shadow, Frost or Fire damage taken by an additional 3% when the corresponding Resistance Aura is active. Reduces all spell damage taken by 3% and Shadow, Frost or Fire damage taken by an additional 6% when the corresponding Resistance Aura is active. Reduces all spell damage taken by 5% and Shadow, Frost or Fire damage taken by an additional 10% when the corresponding Resistance Aura is active.
Protects you from death for 4 seconds after taking lethal damage. Causes Forebearance.
Ranged attacks against you, from more than 20 yds away, have a 5% chance to increase your movement speed by 30% for 3 secs. Ranged attacks against you, from more than 20 yds away, have a 10% chance to increase your movement speed by 30% for 3 secs.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 5%. Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 10%. Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 15%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 3%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 6%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 9%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 12%. Reduces the Mana cost of your instant cast spells by 15%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by 10%. Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by 20%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 2%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 6%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 8%. Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 10%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%. Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 2%. Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 3%.
Gives the Paladin's damaging melee attacks a chance to reduce the target's critical strike damage by 12% for 10 sec. Gives the Paladin's damaging melee attacks a chance to reduce the target's critical strike damage by 25% for 10 sec.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 3%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 4%. Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.
Increases your chance to hit with Judgement by 4%. Increases your chance to hit with Judgement by 8%.
Binds the power of a Seal spell to the Paladin for 10 mins. Code effects do not stack with their base Seal effects.
All spell criticals against you cause 15% of the damage taken to the caster as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health. All spell criticals against you cause 30% of the damage taken to the caster as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health.
Your Retribution Aura restores you Mana equal to 2% of the Holy damage you deal. Your Retribution Aura restores you Mana equal to 4% of the Holy damage you deal. Your Retribution Aura restores you Mana equal to 6% of the Holy damage you deal. Your Retribution Aura restores you Mana equal to 8% of the Holy damage you deal. Your Retribution Aura restores you Mana equal to 10% of the Holy damage you deal.
Gives you a 50% chance to gain an extra attack after being the victim of a critical strike. Gives you a 100% chance to gain an extra attack after being the victim of a critical strike.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Judgement and Hammer of Wrath spells by 3% and an additional 7% against enemies that are stunned or incapacitated. Increases the critical strike chance of your Judgement and Hammer of Wrath spells by 6% and an additional 14% against enemies that are stunned or incapacitated. Increases the critical strike chance of your Judgement and Hammer of Wrath spells by 10% and an additional 20% against enemies that are stunned or incapacitated.
Gives your Judgement spell a 50% chance to refresh all Judgements on the target. Gives your Judgement spell a 100% chance to refresh all Judgements on the target.
Gives the Paladin a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 70% of normal weapon damage. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time. Lasts 30 sec. Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 97 to 105 Holy damage, plus 24 to 27 bonus Holy damage for every negative effect on the target. Bonus damage is capped at 10 effects.
Gives you a 1% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 15 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Gives you a 2% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 15 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Gives you a 3% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 15 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Gives you a 4% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 15 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Gives you a 5% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 15 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 6 sec. Any damage caused will awaken the target. Usable against Humanoids, Demons, Undead, Dragonkin and Giants.
